entry.string: You must be #(1) or over, or have parental permission to register here.
entry.translation: Yuoo moost be-a #(1) oor oofer, oor hefe-a perentel permeessiun tu regeester here-a.

entry.string: By clicking on the above link you certify that you are either #(1) or over, or that you have parental consent to register here.
entry.translation: By cleecking oon zee ebufe-a leenk yuoo certeeffy thet yuoo ere-a ieezeer #(1) oor oofer, oor thet yuoo hefe-a perentel cunsent tu regeester here-a.
